Class CustomAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<CustomAdapter.MyViewHolder>
      • fr.sy43.studzero.activities.CustomAdapter

  • public class CustomAdapter
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<CustomAdapter.MyViewHolder>
    custom adapter for the recycler view of the new budget 2 screen (select the categories to keep from the old budget)
